# Sample Stellaris Technology File
# This is an example for testing purposes

tech_basic_science_lab_1 = {
	cost = 0
	area = physics
	tier = 0
	start_tech = yes
	category = { computing }

	weight = 100
}

tech_powered_exoskeletons = {
	cost = 2000
	area = physics
	tier = 1
	category = { materials }
	prerequisites = { "tech_basic_science_lab_1" }
	weight = 85
}

tech_plasma_1 = {
	cost = 4000
	area = physics
	tier = 2
	category = { particles }
	prerequisites = { "tech_powered_exoskeletons" }
	weight = 75
}

tech_plasma_2 = {
	cost = 8000
	area = physics
	tier = 3
	category = { particles }
	prerequisites = { "tech_plasma_1" }
	weight = 65
}

tech_jump_drive_1 = {
	cost = 12000
	area = physics
	tier = 4
	is_rare = yes
	category = { particles }
	prerequisites = { "tech_plasma_2" "tech_hyperspace_theory" }
	weight = 35
}

tech_hyperspace_theory = {
	cost = 6000
	area = physics
	tier = 2
	category = { field_manipulation }
	prerequisites = { "tech_powered_exoskeletons" }
	weight = 70
}

tech_psi_jump_drive_1 = {
	cost = 20000
	area = physics
	tier = 5
	is_rare = yes
	is_dangerous = yes
	category = { particles }
	prerequisites = { "tech_jump_drive_1" }
	weight = 20
}
